div.p: Once more I'll write you with out recieving a letter from you. I would give anything to get some mail, but have give up all hopes I had a letter from Mother last week is the only letter I have recieved in a month

I dont blame the people back home for I know you all wrote me. But the mail service is awful here. Now when I do get my mail ill get a big bunch at once. And they will be about two months old. We we first got here we had good service would get mail every week.
This leave me all old and hope you are fine and dandy/ I am still working real hard every day. But it is nice and cool and I know you are about to burn up back in Tennessee.
The mornings are all cold when we get up I wear a thick shirt a wool sweater and a suit of overalls and never get to warm. How do you think you would like that.
I am in the mountains though is why it is so cold. Sure hope i leave here before winter comes if I dont I see myself freezing to death. Well wht do you think of the paper news now ? looks good to me.

I hope they can keep it and i might eat christmas dinner in Berlin. Wouldnt that be nice? I saw some boys I know from home last sunday Max Harper from Jackson and some boys from Cairo Ill. They worked for the I. C. Road.

They have been here a year but have just come where I am so I had to go see them they have gone now though so guess I wont see them again. Max Harper worked for them and I guess you didnt know him. Jm Cartmell got a letter from his brother Hugh you know him dont you? He is over here some where. I think all of the first boys to leave Jackson are over here now sure wish I could find them. But may go all the way through and never see any of them.
Say you know I never did write Ester and her mom I lost the address before I had time to write I remember Pratt City was ther any more to it.
Has Ester been back to Jackson since she married? I bet she has
How is Aunt Annie getting along. Oh how I would like to be at 307 Johnson St. this PM. You know I could play in my back yard. ha ha But I dont think such a thing will happen any wheres soon.

Say do you get my letters? I wrote you every week. I hope you get mine more regular than I get yours. Well Dear I know some more I could write but most not so write me real often and tell me all the news and dont forget
